scenario.init: Machine is in normal operation and hydraulic pressure is ok.
scenario.instead_failure: A leak causes hydraulic pressure to fall continuously; once pressure drops below the threshold (Hyd_Pressure < ca. 6600), the system detects a low‑pressure fault and raises an alarm.

diagnoses.name: Leakage in hydraulics system
diagnoses.comment: Leakage results in loss of pressure in the hydraulics system
